import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { CommonService } from 'src/app/services/common.service'; import { HomeService } from 'src/app/services/home.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-blog-detail', templateUrl: './blog-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./blog-detail.component.css'] }) export class BlogDetailComponent implements OnInit { blog: any; blogId!: string; recentPostTitles: string[] = []; // Array to store recent post titles constructor( private homeService: HomeService, private route: ActivatedRoute, private commonService: CommonService, private router : Router ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.blogId = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id')!; this.getSingleBlog(this.blogId); this.loadRecentPostTitles(); // Load recent post titles here } getSingleBlog(id: string) { this.homeService.getSingleBlog(id).subscribe({ next: (res) => { this.blog = res.data; console.log("Blog Data", this.blog); }, error: (err) => { console.error("Error fetching blog data", err); } }); } goToDetail(id:string){ this.router.navigate(['blog',id]) } getImagePath(image: any) { return this.commonService.createImagePath(image.data.attributes.url); } // Load recent post titles (You can fetch these titles from your API or set them manually) loadRecentPostTitles() { this.recentPostTitles = ['NEW', 'SOMETHING', 'ICT SOLUTION']; // Add your titles here } }
